comment.author: 20612279@N00
comment._content:
Even now ALL children need a good balanced diet at school.

In the UK we used to get free milk at school to help with our diet.  Unfortunately Maggie Thatcher the Milk Snatcher took it away from us in the early 1970s.

I WILL NEVER FORGIVE HER!

She really couldn't care less about children from deprived backgrounds!  Just so long as she didn't have to help pay to make sure poorer children didn't suffer!

Phil.
